name: Abby Herrera-Madrid
title: Aspiring Software Engineer | Healthcare Technology Enthusiast
tagline: Building the bridge between pharmacy and technology
bio: I'm a certified pharmacy technician transitioning into software engineering with a mission to revolutionize healthcare technology. With hands-on experience in pharmacy operations and a growing expertise in web development, I create practical solutions that address real-world healthcare challenges. Currently expanding my technical skills while leveraging my unique healthcare background to build intuitive, user-centered applications.

projects.name: Prep Calc
projects.description: A comprehensive Flask-powered web application that streamlines pharmacy compounding calculations and inventory management. Features automated dosage calculations, real-time inventory tracking, and an intuitive interface designed for fast-paced pharmacy environments. Built to reduce medication errors and improve workflow efficiency.
highlights: Automated compound preparation calculations with unit conversion
Real-time inventory tracking and low-stock alerts
User-friendly interface optimized for pharmacy workflows
Calculation history log for quality assurance

projects.name: My Portfolio
projects.description: A dynamic, responsive portfolio website showcasing my journey from pharmacy to software engineering. Built with modern web technologies and designed with clean UI/UX principles to present projects, skills, and professional background in an engaging format.
highlights: Fully responsive design across all devices
Dynamic content rendering with Flask templates
Smooth animations and modern UI aesthetics

about.heading: From Prescriptions to Programming
paragraphs: My journey into tech began in the pharmacy, where I witnessed firsthand how outdated systems and inefficient workflows impact patient care. This sparked my passion for creating software solutions that make a real difference in healthcare.

As I develop my programming skills, I'm combining my pharmacy expertise with modern web technologies to build applications that address genuine pain points in the healthcare industry. My goal is to create tools that are not just functional, but intuitive and impactful.

contact.message: Let's connect! Whether you want to discuss healthcare tech, collaborate on a project, or just chat about code, I'd love to hear from you.
